channel.title: [508] How to add NPC's?
channel.description:
I am hosting a 508 RSPS
I was wondering if anyone could help me out and tell me how I could possibly do this, ...
I am in the process of making a new form of Gambling for my server, I wanted to know how I could make a NPC spawn in a certain area (permenantly) along with that is how would I make it so that only lets say owners could attack that NPC.
The NPC ID I am hoping to use is 1676;
Thanks :)

item.title: [508] How to add NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

If it’s xml it shouldn’t be to hard to write it, just will take a bit longer since you have to type out all the tags for it…

Read full topic

item.title: [508] How to add NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

I believe it’s a .xml file like he said.

gonna look like this:

<npcDefinitions> <ID> npcID = 494 </ID> </npcDefinitions>
(I gave up, don’t know how to write xml, but my fail example above helps a bit)

Instead of this:

Maybe NpcDefinitions.java? .xml?

Read full topic

item.title: [508] How to add NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

I am not to sure on how 508’s load data like npcs and shops and such, so I will have to throw a guess out in the air.

If you can find a configuration file that says NPC, or Autospawn, or NPCspawn, then you should be able to edit that and add the npc you wish to add.

The configuration file can either be a .txt, .cfg, .xml, .data, not sure why everyone uses so many different extensions…

Read full topic
